cause.description:
Our Goal is to help people think about our cause. N*zi- or racist- perspectives are totally outdated!
This is the reason why we are trying to help people to understand our cause.
Humans of all races can live together peacefully!
Thanks for Donating!
1. All people are equal human beings, disregarding their ethnicity, race, belief or color!
2. Racists are not welcome anywhere...
3. Free your Mind!!
cause.name: Antifa Liechtenstein
